content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM’s culture is diverse and as an increasing global team we not only come from 30+ countries across 4 different continents, but we share a common culture and interests, as well as a passion for results.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Individually, we are shaped by our history and our local experience, but collectively we are a global team.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To learn more about EPAM values, corporate culture, pillars and identity, please watch the video by Larry Solomon (our Chief People Officer).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"//videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=PJ6YDbRX\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Engineering is in our DNA. Since 1993, we’ve helped the world’s leading companies imagine, design, engineer, and deliver software that changes the world. Today, we are more than developers. We are the experts that will take customers' business to the next level.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM, we believe that technology defines business success, and we relentlessly pursue the best solution for every client to solve where others fail. We work together in diverse teams to innovate and deliver RESULTS. RELENTLESSLY.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"OUR PILLARS: WHO IS EPAM? \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FFA21D\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our brand pillars are the most important attributes of the brand and business that we would like to communicate.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":1458589,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f6d39df4-acc1-4132-a7cc-3539393af98d/pillars.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f6d39df4-acc1-4132-a7cc-3539393af98d/pillars.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"pillars.png\",\"name\":\"pillars.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f6d39df4-acc1-4132-a7cc-3539393af98d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1055,\"height\":353.0255023183926},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DEVELOPERS’ DEVELOPERS:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FFA21D\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" We are proud of our heritage as Developers’ Developers. We’ve helped large corporations and technology giants innovate and bring unique products to market: From the roots of SAP’s CRM applications to Google’s YouTube Creator Academy to driving market-leading performance for Expedia, to connecting transactions around the world for EBAY, EPAM persists in playing a significant role in digital transformation around the globe.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We continue to build our expertise and our capabilities for the world’s leading technology companies.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"COMMITTED PARTNERS: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FFA21D\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are relentless in our pursuit of solutions that help our clients and we deliver where others often fall short. We do the right thing, every time – because it’s right. We invest in EPAMers around the world, helping to find and develop the brightest minds and to build dynamic, lasting careers. Our client projects become communities, which spark innovation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PROBLEM SOLVERS:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FFA21D\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" As technology drives unprecedented change in traditional and emerging industries, our clients demand more than excellence in engineering. They demand solutions to business challenges that are here today and to those that will become challenges tomorrow.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We bring agility, deep insights and the best engineering capability in the world, to simplify complexity and solve what others cannot.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"OUR VALUES\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FFA21D\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":33349,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/aa725ed7-8eaf-48d7-894d-f3e200ba68dd/values.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/aa725ed7-8eaf-48d7-894d-f3e200ba68dd/values.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"values.PNG\",\"name\":\"values.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"aa725ed7-8eaf-48d7-894d-f3e200ba68dd\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":655,\"height\":484.99999999999994},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FFA21D\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We value five core values and their corresponding actions, which determine the way we work from day-to-day. It all starts with our values – without them, our future successes would be unthinkable.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We value the individual\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FFA21D\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"People are the source of our success. Working in such a complex sector as IT, we try to provide an environment where our employees can thrive.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We provide unlimited opportunities for professional development, including a variety of projects, the chance to try out different roles, working in a team of professionals, and the opportunity to relocate to other countries.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We contribute to the growth and development of our employees through webinars, training on soft and tech skills, conferences, English language education, and more.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We evaluate people based on their results, and we are tolerant to errors, because we know that we learn from our mistakes.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We focus on the customer\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FFA21D\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As an outsourcing company, we especially recognize the importance of developing strong and lasting relationships with our customers. We strive to understand our clients' needs and to become their responsive, responsible and honest business partner.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At present, EPAM has accumulated vast expertise in various business areas, and is actively developing competency centers that allow us to speak with the customer in the same language and offer them services that will make their businesses profitable.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We act as a team\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FFA21D\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"First and foremost, we are a team. We respect each other and try to maintain and develop not only our own ideas, but the ideas of our colleagues as well. When moving from project to project and team to team, it is important to be able to find common ground and learn to work well with different people, including colleagues from other countries who speak different languages.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We maintain our team spirit through project team-building initiatives, corporate-sponsored social events, and external sporting events. In addition to customer projects, we involve our people in internal projects as well.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We strive for excellence\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FFA21D\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For any IT company, it is important to maintain high standards of work, to stay abreast of the latest trends, and to constantly develop and strive for innovation. No matter what you do at EPAM, you can make positive contributions at any level. We value self-starters and those who take initiative, because without that, innovation is impossible.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We act with integrity\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FFA21D\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is a public company. In 2012, the company launched an IPO. It would have been impossible without observing the principles of openness and honesty. In our work, we observe laws, ethical standards and internal rules. Each of us is responsible for our own work. By offering our people freedom and independence, we are also endowing them with responsibility.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"OUR PERSONALITY: HOW DOES EPAM DO IT?\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FFA21D\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We believe that we are different from other companies and we express ourselves in a way that makes it clear that we personify these traits. Six adjectives describe how we approach our work.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":49521,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bf6bdd0b-663b-44c9-8c56-7abf56ae0063/personalities.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bf6bdd0b-663b-44c9-8c56-7abf56ae0063/personalities.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"personalities.png\",\"name\":\"personalities.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"bf6bdd0b-663b-44c9-8c56-7abf56ae0063\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":772,\"height\":513},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"OUR IDEAL TEAM MEMBERS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FFA21D\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"OUR IDEAL TEAM MEMBERS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" possess a combination of three essential virtues — humility, hunger and people smarts — that enable teamwork and make it more likely members can overcome the five dysfunctions that derail teams.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our ideal team members are \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"humble\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FFA21D\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". They lack excessive ego or concerns about status. Humble people are quick to point out the contributions of others and slow to seek attention for their own. They share credit, emphasize team over self and define success collectively rather than individually. HUMBLE team members are able to be vulnerable, engage in honest conflict and hold others accountable. They define success collectively, commit to team goals and do not value status or ego.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our ideal team members are \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"hungry\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FFA21D\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". They are always looking for more. More things to do. More to learn. More responsibility to take on. Hungry people almost never have to be pushed by a manager to work harder because they are self-motivated and diligent. They are constantly thinking about the next step and the next opportunity. HUNGRY team members are willing to engage in uncomfortable conflict and hold others accountable. They will go above and beyond to achieve results and are always contemplating the next step.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our ideal team members are \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"smart\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FFA21D\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". They have common sense about people. Smart people tend to know what is happening in a group situation and how to deal with others in the most effective way. They have good judgment and intuition around the subtleties of group dynamics and the impact of their words and actions. SMART team members understand group dynamics and can tactfully engage in productive conflict. They have good interpersonal skills and tend to understand how to deal with others in the most effective way.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
